statement.p: How many degrees are in each angle?

ol.li: Through what angle does the hour hand of a clock rotate between 2 pm and 10 pm?
Through what angle does the hour hand of a clock rotate between 2 am and 10 pm?
Through what angle does the minute hand of a clock rotate between 3:25 am and 3:50 am?

statement.p:
Draw two different angles \alpha and \beta in standard position whose sine is 0.6. Note that the radius of the circle is 1,
Use a protractor to measure \alpha and \beta.
Find the reference angles for both \alpha and \beta. Draw in the reference triangles.

Draw two different angles \theta and \phi in standard position whose sine is -0.8.
Use a protractor to measure \theta and \phi.
Find the reference angles for both \theta and \phi. Draw in the reference triangles.

statement.p: Complete the table with exact values.
In which two quadrants is the statement true?

introduction.p: For Problems 5964, find a second angle between 0\degree and 360\degree with the given trigonometric ratio.

statement.p: Explain why the definitions of the trigonometric ratios for a third-quadrant angle (between 180\degree and 270\degree) are independent of the point P chosen on the terminal side. Illustrate with a figure.

answer.p: Sides of similar triangles are proportional.

statement.p: Explain why the definitions of the trigonometric ratios for a fourth-quadrant angle (between 270\degree and 360\degree) are independent of the point P chosen on the terminal side. Illustrate with a figure.
